summary: The Medicare Fraud Detection and Deterrence Act of 2025 aims to strengthen provisions against healthcare waste, fraud, and abuse. It mandates deactivation of provider identifiers for entities excluded from federal healthcare programs, requires Medicare Advantage plans to include provider identifiers for specific services, and mandates the use of a claims modifier to identify relationships between telehealth suppliers and telehealth companies to ensure proper claims processing. The bill looks to increase the efficient use of taxpayer dollars.
